sentences: Sarthak Sardana (born 24 July 1988), better known by his stage name Sartek, is an Indian DJ and music producer.
He was also the opening act for Justin Bieber, Armin Van Buuren, Martin Garrix, Steve Aoki, Axwell, Nicky Romero and others during their India tour.
Sartek is a New Delhi native whose past preference of choice of career was becoming a Chartered accountant, for which he passed the main examinations.
